mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resumes (user_id, file_path, original_filename, file_size, is_default) VALUES (#{userId}, #{filePath}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize}, #{isDefault})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id as userId, file_path as filePath, original_filename as originalFilename, file_size as fileSize, is_default as isDefault, uploaded_at as uploadedAt FROM resumes WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY uploaded_at DESC

SELECT id, user_id as userId, file_path as filePath, original_filename as originalFilename, file_size as fileSize, is_default as isDefault, uploaded_at as uploadedAt FROM resumes WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
